marketing.title: The <highlited>Document Editor</highlited> for the Web
marketing.short-description: Your documents write themselves (almost!): Leverage intelligent autocomplete for variables, saving you time and ensuring accuracy. Create reusable templates, combine and reuse items as elements, add to your documents physical signature and so more.

editor.title: Create Templates
editor.description: Transform your document creation process with our intelligent variable system. Simply click on any highlighted variable to customize your content in seconds. Reuse same temlates and just change variables to create new documents.
editor.editor_text: Patient ((patient_name)). Given the patient's gender: ((gender)) and medical history, pay attention to ((health_risk_area)). Monitor the course of the illness, especially regarding ((specific_symptom_1)) and ((specific_symptom_2)).

sing-in_page.title: Sign in
sing-in_page.description: Sign in to your account using one of the options below.
sing-in_page.button: Sign in with Email and Password

sign_in_magic_page.title: Check your email
sign_in_magic_page.description: We sent you a link to sign in. Check the link in your email

sign_in_magic_page_error.title: Expired Token
sign_in_magic_page_error.description: Sorry, this token was either expired or already used. Please try logging in again

sign_out_page.title: Sucessfully Signed out
sign_out_page.description: You have been successfully signed out.

sign_up_verify_page.title: Check your email
sign_up_verify_page.description: We sent you a link to verify your email. Check the link in your email

sign_up_verify_page_error.title: Expired Token
sign_up_verify_page_error.description: Sorry, this token was either expired or already used. Please try sign up in again

magic_link.title: Login to {app_name}
magic_link.description: Click the button below to securely log in to your account. This link is valid for {expiry_minutes} minutes and can only be used once.
magic_link.help: If the button does not work, copy and paste this link into your browser:
magic_link.not_requested: If you did not request this login link, you can safely ignore this email.
magic_link.info: For security, this link expires in {expiry_minutes} minutes.

verify.title: Verify email to {app_name}
verify.description: Click the button below to verify your email and have full access to {env.APP_NAME}
verify.help: If the button does not work, copy and paste this link into your browser:
verify.not_requested: If you did not request this verify link, you can safely ignore this email.
verify.info: For security, this link expires in {expiry_minutes} minutes.
